paper_abstract: The analysis of Cosmic Microwave Background (CMB) datasets poses a significant computational challenge. Since 1997, researchers at Berkeley Lab have used the National Energy Research Scientific Computing Center (NERSC) to meet this challenge, constantly adapting their analysis algorithms and implementations to both the exponential growth of the data and the architectural evolution of the NERSC supercomputers.
paper_title: Big Bang, Big Data, Big Iron: Fifteen Years of Cosmic Microwave Background Data Analysis at NERSC
